A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi was an overly long and mundane film with very few new ideas or original plot. My son and I were both disappointed and I'm amazed at the \"Profeesional Critic\" reviews which have obviously been bought and paid for by Disney. I've been watching this Franchise since 1977 and I can honestly say this is probably the worse one. Some of the new characters are appalling and I was hoping they all got killed off. I won't pay cinema prices for the next one\, i will wait for it to come onto Television.
